name: Diamond Pusher
description:
Diamond Pusher is a simple puzzle game.

The goal is to push diamonds onto red tiled switches.

This game started off as a final year university project for the Raspberry Pi, but shortly after I completed the course, I added more content and improved some of the graphics.

Even though this game's essentially finished, I'll be adding more content such as more challenging levels, diamond designs, music and more.

The Raspberry Pi version of this game is available on the Raspberry Pi Store.
